response.original_title: Connected: Vermont's Grassroots Effort for Rural Broadband
response.overview: The historic, inspiring, and uniquely Vermont story of the grassroots effort across the state to come together to solve a common problem - the lack of internet connectivity.
response.tagline: The historic, inspiring, and uniquely Vermont story of the grassroots effort across the state to come together to solve a common problem - the lack of internet connectivity.
response.title: Connected: Vermont's Grassroots Effort for Rural Broadband
